game.name: Penniless Chef
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "Penniless Chef"는 식당을 직접 운영하여 성장 시키는 게임입니다. 식당을 운영하여 성장 시키고 마을 주민들과 친해져보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Penniless Chef" is a game where you run and grow your own restaurant. Run and grow your restaurant, and get to know the villagers!
